The Council can provide a wide range of opportunities for people to volunteer locally

Whether you are interested in working with children, young people or developing projects in your area talk to us and we will find the ideal volunteer placement for you. In return we offer:

  • Appropriate training, development and support
  • Opportunities to be part of a team, meet new people, make new friends
  • Valuable work experience

For volunteering opportunities in your area see below:
